main :- value.
value :- (object | array | int | string | null).
int :- [[0-9], repSep([0-9], "")].
object :- ["{", repSep(keyValue, ","), "}"].
keyValue :- [string, ":", value].
array :- ["[", repSep(value, ","), "]"].
null :- "null".
string :- ["\"", repSep(stringChar, ""), "\""].
stringChar :- (^'"' | ['\\', '"']).
----
text/plain
